admin.licenseInfo.seats.title: Number of Seats
admin.licenseInfo.seats.description.zero: You have no seats remaining. Upgrade if necessary.
admin.licenseInfo.seats.description.unde: You have used more seats than you have available. Remove users or upgrade if necessary.

admin.licenseInfo.expiresAt.title: Expires At

admin.licenseInfo.selfHostedNoLicense.de: Thank you for using Cryptomator Hub! You have been granted the Community License. If you need more seats, upgrade your license.
admin.licenseInfo.managedNoLicense.descr: Thank you for using Cryptomator Hub! You currently have no active license.
archiveVaultDialog.title: Archive Vault
archiveVaultDialog.description: Archiving a vault makes it inactive. This may free up occupied seats. An archived vault can be reactivated later.
auditLog.title: Audit Logs
auditLog.paymentRequired.description: Audit Logs are only available with a paid license. You can get one in the admin section.
claimVaultOwnershipDialog.title: Claim Vault Ownership
claimVaultOwnershipDialog.description: Type in the vault admin password to prove you have permissions to manage this vault.
fetchError.title: Fetching data failed
createVault.enterRecoveryKey.title: Recover Vault
createVault.enterRecoveryKey.description: Enter the recovery key of your existing vault to create a new vault template from it.
createVault.enterVaultDetails.title: Create Vault
createVault.enterVaultDetails.descriptio: Enter a name and description for your new vault. You can change these later.
createVault.showRecoveryKey.title: Recovery Key
createVault.showRecoveryKey.description: The following recovery key can be used to restore access to the vault.
createVault.showRecoveryKey.confirmRecov: I understand that I will lose access to the vault in the event of an emergency if I don't have the recovery key.
createVault.error.formValidationFailed: Please check the form and try again.
createVault.error.vaultAlreadyExists: A vault with the given name already exists.
createVault.error.paymentRequired: Your Cryptomator Hub license has exceeded the number of available seats or has expired. Please inform a Hub administrator to upgrade or renew the license.
createVault.success.title: Vault created
createVault.success.description: After downloading the zipped vault folder, unpack it to any location shared with your team members.
deviceList.empty.description: To add a device, add a vault from this Hub to the Cryptomator app of the device and unlock it.
deviceList.title: Authorized Devices and Browsers
downloadVaultTemplateDialog.title: Download Vault Template
downloadVaultTemplateDialog.description: Download and unpack the zipped vault template to any location shared with your team members. This is required only once during the initial setup.
editVaultMetadataDialog.title: Edit Vault Metadata
editVaultMetadataDialog.description: Update the name and description of the vault.
editVaultMetadataDialog.error.formValida: Vault name must not be empty.
editVaultMetadataDialog.error.vaultAlrea: A vault with the given name already exists.
grantPermissionDialog.title: Grant Permission
grantPermissionDialog.description: Share vault keys with newly added users.
manageSetupCode.title: Setup Code
reactivateVaultDialog.title: Reactivate Vault
reactivateVaultDialog.description: Warning: Reactivating a vault may affect the number of available seats. If the number of available seats is exceeded, unlocking of all vaults will be blocked.
recoveryKeyDialog.title: Recovery Key
recoveryKeyDialog.description: This is your recovery key for "{0}". Keep it safe, it is your only chance to regain access to a vault in case of system outage.
regenerateSetupCodeDialog.confirmRegener: Do you want to generate a new Setup Code? If you do so, the old one will be invalidated.
Be sure to save this new code. You'll need it to sign in to new devices. You can safely delete the old one.
resetUserAccountDialog.title: Reset User Account
resetUserAccountDialog.description: Only reset your account if you've lost your Setup Code. You will lose access to all your vaults and the vault owner(s) will have to grant you access again.
setupUserKey.setupCode.description: Your Setup Code is required to authorize this browser.
setupUserKey.deviceName.description: Name this browser for easy identification in your authorized devices list.
setupUserKey.createUserKey.title: Initial Setup
setupUserKey.createUserKey.description: This is your first login on this browser.
setupUserKey.saveSetupCode.title: Save your Setup Code
setupUserKey.saveSetupCode.description: You'll need it to sign in to new devices.
setupUserKey.saveSetupCode.setupCodeHint: You can look up your Setup Code later in your profile.
setupUserKey.enterSetupCode.title: Authorization Required
setupUserKey.enterSetupCode.description: This is your first login on this browser.
setupUserKey.lostSetupCode.title: Lost your Setup Code?
